alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Knox; Mason; Menard; Morgan; Peoria; Sangamon; Schuyler; Stark; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN MENARD...FULTON...WESTERN SANGAMON...SOUTHWESTERN STARK...SOUTHEASTERN KNOX...WEST CENTRAL TAZEWELL...CASS...EASTERN SCHUYLER...MASON...WESTERN PEORIA AND NORTHEASTERN MORGAN COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 612 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Knoxville to near Chapin. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Canton, Havana, Lewistown, Virginia, Alexander, Knoxville, Farmington, Petersburg, Elmwood, Princeville, Manito, New Berlin, Ashland, Cuba, Hanna City, Glasford, Trivoli, Brimfield, and Pleasant Plains. This includes the following highways... Interstate 72 between mile markers 63 and 89. Interstate 74 between mile markers 52 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Fulton; Knox; Mason; Menard; Morgan; Peoria; Sangamon; Schuyler; Stark; Tazewell
